languages.text: "Не могу не согласиться, Лорд-капитан. Служу династии фон Валанциус!" {n}Абеляр отдает честь дрожащей рукой, и на его сморщенном лице появляется тень былого выражения.{/n}
"I could not agree more, Lord Captain. I serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutes you with a shaking hand, and a ghost of his usual stern expression returns to his wrinkled face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не могу не согласиться, Лорд-капитан. Служу династии фон Валанциус!" {n}Абеляр отдает честь дрожащей рукой, и на его сморщенном лице появляется тень былого выражения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I could not agree more, Lord Captain. I serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutes you with a shaking head, and a ghost of his former expression returns to his wrinkled face.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I could not agree more, Lord Captain. I serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutes you with a shaking hand, and a ghost of his usual stern expression returns to his wrinkled face.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I could not agree more, Lord Captain. I serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutes you with a shaking hand, and a ghost of his usual stern expression returns to his wrinkled face.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「まったく同感です、ロード・キャプテン。私はフォン・ヴァランシウス家にお仕えします！」 {n}アベラルドは頭を振りながら敬礼し、しわくちゃの顔に以前の面影が戻ってきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not agree more, Lord Captain. I serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutes you with a shaking hand, and a ghost of his usual stern expression returns to his wrinkled face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「まったく同感です、ロード・キャプテン。私はフォン・ヴァランシウス家にお仕えします！」 {n}アベラルドは頭を振りながら敬礼し、しわくちゃの顔に以前の面影が戻ってきた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我完全同意，舰长大人。我愿侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族！”{n}阿贝拉德摇了摇头，向你致敬，满是皱纹的脸上再度露出惯常的严肃表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not agree more, Lord Captain. I serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutes you with a shaking hand, and a ghost of his usual stern expression returns to his wrinkled face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我完全同意，舰长大人。我愿侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族！”{n}阿贝拉德摇了摇头，向你致敬，满是皱纹的脸上再度露出你熟悉的表情。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No podría estar más de acuerdo, Lord Capitán. ¡Sirvo a la casa von Valancius!». {n}Abelard te saluda sacudiendo la cabeza y el fantasma de su expresión anterior vuelve a su arrugado rostro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not agree more, Lord Captain. I serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutes you with a shaking hand, and a ghost of his usual stern expression returns to his wrinkled face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No podría estar más de acuerdo, Lord Capitán. ¡Sirvo a la casa von Valancius!». {n}Abelard te saluda sacudiendo la cabeza y su expresión anterior vuelve a su arrugado rostro.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin ganz Eurer Meinung, Lord Captain. Ich diene dem Haus von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutiert mit zittriger Hand, und ein Schatten seines sonst so strengen Ausdrucks kehrt in sein faltiges Gesicht zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not agree more, Lord Captain. I serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutes you with a shaking hand, and a ghost of his usual stern expression returns to his wrinkled face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ganz Eurer Meinung, Lord Captain. Ich diene dem Haus von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutiert mit zittriger Hand, und ein Schatten seines früheren Ausdrucks kehrt in sein faltiges Gesicht zurück.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis on ne peut plus d'accord avec vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis au service de la maison von Valancius ! » {n}Abélard se met au garde-à-vous sans parvenir à contrôler ses tremblements, mais vous percevez sur son visage ridé une étincelle de sa ferveur d'antan.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not agree more, Lord Captain. I serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutes you with a shaking hand, and a ghost of his usual stern expression returns to his wrinkled face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis on ne peut plus d'accord avec vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis au service de la maison von Valancius ! » {n}Abélard se met au garde-à-vous sans pour autant parvenir à contrôler ses tremblements, mais vous percevez dans son regard ridé une étincelle de sa ferveur d'antan.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ben dünden razıyım Lord Kaptan. Von Valancius Hanesi'nin hizmetindeyim!" {n}Abelard, titreyen eliyle sana selam çakıyor. Buruşmuş yüzündeki tipik sert yüz ifadesi, silik de olsa yeniden beliriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not agree more, Lord Captain. I serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard salutes you with a shaking hand, and a ghost of his usual stern expression returns to his wrinkled face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Zaten dünden razıyım Lord Kaptan. Von Valancius Hanesi'nin hizmetindeyim!" {n}Abelard, titreyen eliyle sana selam çakıyor. Buruşmuş yüzündeki tipik sert yüz ifadesi, silik de olsa yeniden yerini alıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
